snippet.title: Make It Stop! - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
“Make It Stop!” is a fast paced shooter that takes place inside the human body. Viruses have invaded the hosts blood stream, and your primary goal is to remotely pilot microscopic ships and eradicate the targets as quickly as possible! You have unlimited fire power, but can overhead quickly; so be careful. Once you start attacking your target, they WILL fight back getting harder and faster with each destroyed target.

You have no upgrades, just your ship, a weapon and your piloting skills to get you through the waves of enemies.

Can you make it to the end and achieve the highest score before running out of ships?

There’s only one way to find out!

Available on the Epic Games Store: Mar 08, 2024

www.ChubbyBubbleGames.com
